name: Dead Weight (Gembit, Lukephos, Keldingull, hucota7)
description:
You might have died, but its far from over! By using your new possession abilities to control entities around you, drag your dead body to the end point marked in each level. Good luck!

Made for The GameDev.tv Game Jam !

Theme: "Death is only the beginning"

WASD for movement,space possesses/unpossesses , F key interacts and drags (if held), E toggles open doors and shuts off lights while possessed.

p.s. there are numerous bugs and issues we never got around to fixing, as a result of one of the major ones the intended way to win the level is not functioning as it should and can skip you through to the end, because of this we left in the debug method of flying to the end so that you can experience the other levels that were included as that one does not level skip.  

We still hope you give it a shot with an open mind and try to visualize how the gameplay 'should' be like.
